display_long_description:
"Tabletop Basketball AR" for Oculus Quest stands out as an avant-garde blend of traditional basketball gameplay and cutting-edge augmented reality (AR) technology. This game offers players an immersive experience that transforms any tabletop into a dynamic 3-on-3 basketball arena. It ingeniously combines the physical skill and strategy of basketball with the interactive capabilities of AR, providing a gaming experience like no other.

Features:

- Dynamic AR Gameplay: Turn any tabletop into a basketball court with immersive AR technology.
- Multiplayer Viewing Experience: Join games within the same environment.
- Intuitive Controls: Designed for Oculus Touch controllers, suitable for all skill levels.
- Realistic Graphics and Sound: High-quality graphics and immersive sound effects enhance the experience.
- Regular Updates: Continuous game improvements and new content based on player feedback.
	
What sets this game apart is its remarkable use of AR technology. The game transforms any flat surface into a virtual basketball court, allowing players to move around and view the game from multiple angles. This feature not only adds a layer of realism to the gameplay but also brings an innovative twist to the traditional sports gaming genre.
